This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Removing the :default button by updating type attribute should update the default button. 
PASS Removing the :default button by detaching should update the default button. 
PASS Removing the :default button by updating form content attribute should update the default button. 
PASS Adding a button by updating type attribute should update the default button. 
PASS Adding a button to a DOM tree should update the default button. 
PASS Adding a button by form content attribute should update the default button. 
PASS Updating type attribute of :default checkbox should update default status 
PASS Updating type attribute of :default radio should update default status 
PASS Updating the checked attribute of :default checkbox or radio should update default status 
PASS Dynamically updating checked status or setting checked attribute should reflect correct default status 
PASS Updating the selected attribute of :default option element should update default status 
PASS Dynamically updating selected status or setting selected attribute should reflect correct default status 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
